Text: WSPP Conference Reception Cc you arriving on Wednesday Oct to the WSPP conference in Coeur dAlene Idaho Calpine would like to invite you to a reception from pm hosted by Calpine in the Hagadone Suite room at the Coeur dAlene Resort If you have any questions give me a call at the number below Hope to see you there Jodi Lietz Office Manager Calpine Corporation SW Broadway Suite Portland OR Phone Fax

Details on Golf Tournament Oct Cc details you will need to know for the golf tournament sponsored by Calpine on October at the WSPP event When you arrive at the Coeur dAlene Resort please check your golf clubs with the bell captains They will be tagged and delivered to the golf course prior to your tee time Time We will be shuttled to the course in the resort Eagle shuttle boats starting directly after the meeting concludes Friday Oct around noon Dress code nice golf attire soft cleats please come to the meeting Friday morning ready to go to the course The Coeur dAlene Resort has a mandatory caddy program a tip is recommended by each golfer also bring some cash for the beersnack cart if you wish Box lunches will be provided for you on your carts at the beginning of the game We will be playing a scramble game so plan to have some FUN This is a beautiful world class course enjoy If you have any questions please feel free to give me a call at Jodi Lietz Office Manager Calpine Corporation SW Broadway Suite Portland OR Phone Fax
